text: Vocabulario manual de las lenguas castellana y mexicana is a Spanish-Nahuatl dictionary by Pedro de Arenas, first published some time before 1611 (the year of the second edition). It was one of the most popular Nahuatl dictionaries, going through at least eleven editions in 220 years. ==References== ==External links== *1793 edition, via Google Books Category:1611 books Category:Nahuatl dictionaries and grammars Category:Classical Nahuatl
title: Vocabulario manual de las lenguas castellana y mexicana
